parameters.query:
WITH w AS (
  SELECT date_trunc('week', CURRENT_DATE - 1)::date AS week_start
)
SELECT
  h.oblast,
  COUNT(*)                                            AS records,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE h.avg_pm25 >= {{ $vars.PM25_LIMIT ?? 10 }}) AS exceed_hours,
  ROUND(AVG(h.avg_pm25)::numeric, 2)                  AS mean,
  ROUND(MAX(h.avg_pm25)::numeric, 1)                  AS peak,
  MIN(h.day)::date                                    AS first_day,
  MAX(h.day)::date                                    AS last_day,
  MAX(h.stations)                                     AS max_stations
FROM pm25_hourly h, w
WHERE h.day >= w.week_start
  AND h.day <  w.week_start + INTERVAL '7 day'
  AND h.stations >= {{ $vars.MIN_STATIONS ?? 1 }}
GROUP BY h.oblast
ORDER BY exceed_hours DESC, mean DESC;
